title: Do you want to register a representative?
subtitle: Your representative can be anyone who's helping you with your appeal and you think should be kept updated, such as a welfare rights adviser, family member or carer.
evidence: submit evidence (and see any that’s submitted)
talkToUs: talk to us on your behalf during your appeal
phoneUp: If you don’t have the details to hand, you can phone up and register them after you’ve submitted your appeal.

hasRepresentative.yes: Yes, I want to register a representative
hasRepresentative.no: No, I don't want to register a representative

error.required: You have to say whether you have a representative. Select either yes or no.
